definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
to pick up cress/fig. sth easy to do/a piece of cake
Arabis, a genus of Brassica family including cress
see 草菅人命[cao3 jian1 ren2 ming4]

sentences.english: North American rock cress having very long curved pods.
sentences.chinese: 北美的一种筷子芥属植物，荚果长，弯曲。

sentences.english: Mustard oil can be extracted from the seeds.
sentences.chinese: 可从芥菜籽中提炼出芥末油。

sentences.english: Like white mustard, field pennycress also has potential as a biodiesel crop.
sentences.chinese: 像白芥一样，野生菥蓂也有可能成为生物柴油作物。

sentences.english: Pollen morphology of Loxostemon (Cruciferae) in China.
sentences.chinese: 中国弯蕊芥属植物花粉形态的观察。

sentences.english: The seeds are about 2 mm in diameter, and may be colored from yellowish white to black.
sentences.chinese: 芥菜籽直径约为2毫米，颜色从黄白色到黑色不等。

sentences.english: Yellow mustard seeds are less fiery than their brown or black counterparts.
sentences.chinese: 黄芥籽的味道比黑芥籽的要淡一些。

sentences.english: It is difficult to obtain the intergeneric hybrid between Brassica napus and Eruca sativa through the routine crossing.
sentences.chinese: 常规有性杂交很难获得油菜与芸芥的属间杂种。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sulfur mustard can directly induce chromosome damage.
sentences.chinese: 结论硫芥能直接诱发细胞染色体损伤。

sentences.english: There is certain difference of matter accumulation between the hybrid and the common species.
sentences.chinese: 茎瘤芥杂交种与常规种的物质积累规律有一定差异。

sentences.english: The study of the techniques for processing pugionium cornutum L.
sentences.chinese: 对沙芥罐头加工技术进行了研究。

sentences.english: Fried Chicken, Scrabble Egg with Tomato, Broccoli, SteamRice.
sentences.chinese: 鸡排，番茄炒蛋，白饭，芥蓝。

definition: finely chopped meat or vegetables/powdered or fragmentary
(old) jade tablet (a ceremonial badge of rank)
